description: This file defines a mock class 'Store2NotificationMock' that implements the INotification interface for testing purposes. It uses Google Mock to simulate notification behavior related to store value changes within the WPEFramework project.

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing the INotification interface to facilitate unit testing of notification callbacks in the store component.

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: Mock method to simulate the value change notification for testing.
